org.nlpcraft.model

Interface NCQueryContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface NCQueryContext
extends Serializable
    Model query context. This context defines fully processed user input and its associated data that the model needs to process and return the result in NCModel.query(NCQueryContext) method.

    See NCIntentSolver for intent base matching utility.
    See Also:
    NCIntentSolver, NCIntentSolverContext

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NCConversationContext getConversationContext()
      Gets current conversation context.
      NCDataSource getDataSource()
      Gets descriptor of data source associated with this context.
      NCModel getModel()
      Gets model instance for this query.
      NCSentence getSentence()
      Gets fully parsed, canonical representation of user input.
      String getServerRequestId()
      Gets ID of the current request.

    • Method Detail

      • getServerRequestId

        String getServerRequestId()
        Gets ID of the current request. Server request is defined as a processing of a one user input sentence (a session).
        Returns:
        Server request ID.
        See Also:
        NCModel.query(NCQueryContext)

      • getModel

        NCModel getModel()
        Gets model instance for this query. .
        Returns:
        Model.

      • getDataSource

        NCDataSource getDataSource()
        Gets descriptor of data source associated with this context.
        Returns:
        Descriptor of data source for the user sentence associated with this context.

      • getSentence

        NCSentence getSentence()
        Gets fully parsed, canonical representation of user input.
        Returns:
        Fully parsed, canonical representation of user input.

      • getConversationContext

        NCConversationContext getConversationContext()
        Gets current conversation context.
        Returns:
        Current conversation context.
